LanguageData.FindNeederLabelDesc: 重新获取可用的接收端,仅限当前地图
LanguageData.UseNextNeederDesc: 从当前获取的接收端列表中选择下一个可用的接收端,已连接的接收端会被略过
LanguageData.CutLinkDesc: 切断当前连接的发射端
LanguageData.BatteryOnceDestroy: One of the disposable battery died.
LanguageData.LoadComponentSpacerDesc: The power generation capacity of the generator is enhanced by loading advanced components.
LanguageData.ClearComponentSpacerDesc: Clear the current component loading task.
